entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
